costs_other_party_paragraph: We do not expect that you will have to pay another party's costs. This only tends to arise in litigation and is therefore not relevant to your matter.
insert_current_position_and_scope_of_ret: We will review the relevant documentation, advise you on your legal position, and take such steps as are agreed to protect your commercial interests.
next_steps: review the documents you have provided and advise on the merits of your position
charges_estimate_paragraph: I estimate the cost of the Initial Scope will be in the region of £2,500 to £5,000 plus VAT, depending on the complexity of the documentation involved.
disbursements_paragraph: We do not anticipate significant disbursements at this stage.
state_why_this_step_is_important: We cannot advise properly without sight of the key documents
insert_consequence: we will be unable to progress your matter
describe_first_document_or_information_y: Copy of the relevant contract or agreement
describe_second_document_or_information_: All relevant correspondence with the other party
describe_third_document_or_information_y: Any supporting invoices, payment records, or evidence
